name: Ever Fall
description:
Controls: 

E - To Shoot, you shoot in the direciton you are moving or where last moving (can only shoot horizontaly not verticaly

R - To interact with everything

WASD- To move

Description:

This is a game where you play as the bulb "trublub" who is venturing down in to the depths of a old mine from when the world still ran on steam.

Explanation:

The 2 boxes in the top are your power up slots, power ups for your bullets only affect the side they are on, while power ups for your AOE attack always affect it no matter the side, although the sword will take precidence over the other one. Every time you kill an enemy you change your "bulb" and your attack type to that of the enemy. Your goal is to beat 10 combat levels, every third level is a utility room where you can heal and get a power up. To go up a level you need to enter the door at the top of the room. In the top right corner you can see how much energy you have left. If your energy goes below zero you will lose a life. Your energy is reset to five when you kill an enemy. This is only a demo and will be expanded on in the future, follow if interested.

Recommended to be played in fullscreen (press the blue button)
